roleset.name: hold and utter a belief

roles.note: Might or might not actually take a hearer. See 'say' for examples of how to tag split/fronted/invertedconstructions.

example.name: basic transitive
example.text: [``The buyers walk away, and the specialist is left alone'' as the buyer of last resort for his stable of stocks]-1, he contends *trace*-1.

roleset.note: Comparison with 'believe' and 'say'. Member of VNcls conjecture-29.5-2.

roleset.name: deal with, suffer through

example.name: transitive
example.text: It has also rattled Federal's strongly anti-union management, which-1 *trace*-1 is already contending with melding far-flung operations.

roleset.note: Member of VNcls battle-36.4. Updated by Julia 11/2010.

predicate.note: Frames file for 'contend' based on sentences in financial subcorpus.
